title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah: Targeting Rocket Launchers and Weapons Facilities in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked Hezbollah weapons storage facilities alongside the launcher from which rockets were fired towards the Abir region earlier today, as well as additional terror targets of the organization in southern Lebanon.

Air Force aircraft targeted the launcher from which rockets were fired towards the Abir region earlier today, alongside a military structure of the organization in the Ayta ash-Shab area.

Additionally, fighter jets from the Air Force recently attacked Hezbollah’s weapons storage facilities in the areas of Bliydah and Khula in southern Lebanon. Furthermore, a terrorist infrastructure of the organization was attacked in the Khula area of southern Lebanon.

Throughout the day, the IDF conducted artillery fire into the areas of Shebaa, Kafr Kila, Ramiah, A-Dahira, and Yarine in southern Lebanon.

During the day, approximately 65 rocket launches were identified crossing from Lebanese territory, some of which were intercepted by air defense fighters, while the rest fell in open areas. The IDF attacked the sources of fire with artillery, and there were no casualties.

Attached is footage from the attacks: https://we.tl/t-OK5qeNA8zl
